column1: Live stream of the construction of the new hospital in Wuhan to deal w/the corona virus outbreak. https://twitter.com/LaiKH5/status/1222306194582163456 …

Chinese comedy "Lost in Russia" w/both English & Chinese subtitles. Due to the corona virus outbreak, producers were unable to release it in theaters in China, so they made it available for free as a Chinese New Year holiday gift.
